channel.title: I added defence and in defence.cfg
channel.description:
I added defence and in defence.cfg i have [code]//--npcid------attak--magedef---defbonus---name-----// npc = 19 20 20 20 //whiteknight [EOF][/code]
and when im on server and i attack a white knight it says in my runserver that it couldnt find defence.cfg?
